raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The shopping behavior reflects a strong preference for beauty and nail art products, emphasizing a genuine interest in enhancing personal appearance. Consistent high ratings (4.0 and above) denote satisfaction with product effectiveness and quality. The individual exhibits a positive sentiment, often describing products as "great," "nice," or indicative of a good deal.

Common themes arise around nail artistry, including products like nail glue and UV lamps, suggesting a focus on nail care and decoration. This individual is likely inclined towards DIY beauty, favoring items that facilitate creative expression in personal grooming.

Quality preference leans towards reliable, effective products, as seen in the strong performance of items that facilitate fast drying and adhesion. Despite varying amounts in average ratings, the individual appears tolerant of minor imperfections, likely prioritizing functionality over perfection.

Price sensitivity seems moderate; positive sentiments regarding value suggest an appreciation for good deals without compromising quality. The presence of products that offer multiple uses or extensive quantities (like the nail charm kit) indicates a preference for practicality and versatility.

Overall, this person displays a passion for beauty-related products, particularly in nail art, valuing quality, functionality, and cost-effectiveness in their purchases while actively engaging in DIY beauty practices.

target_interaction.title: Great buy
target_interaction.text: Great brush nice feel love handle
target_interaction.title_meta: ANGNYA Acrylic Nail Brush，Kolinsky Nail Art Brushes for Acrylic Application，Size 8 Oval Crimped Sable Acrylic Brush for Professional Manicure DIY Home Salon(Pink)
features: 【KOLINSKY SABLE HAIR】This acrylic brush is made of premium quality kolinsky sable hair, more flexible and softable with a better powder absorption and good ductility, and better coloring. Less likely to come off than ordinary nylon nail brushes.This nail brush for acrylic application can sculpt and shape any nail shapes and sizes for all your acrylic nail needs.

【STYLISH DESIGN】The smooth and irregular fashion crystal handle with sturdy nickel plated copper ferrule, crimped oval shaped brush head holds the kolinsky sable hair firmly to prevent splitting or deformation of the hairs. The acrylic nail brush's handle is lightly, stable, durable, sweat resistant and easy to hold, applying the acrylic powder more convient.

【MAINTENANCE】The correct maintenance method can extend the service life of the bristles. Please use special brush cleaner to clean the acrylic brushes after each use, DO NOT use acetone, otherwise it will remove the shine from bristle, making acrylic tacky and buildup residue. Absorb and shape the water before storage, cover with the PVC protective cap that comes with the product to protect the hair from splitting. The acrylic nail brush is encased in a PVC tube to keeps itself clean and dry.

【RANGE OF APPLICATION】 Our nail brush for acrylic application is suitable for all nail art, such as applying acrylic powder, extension nail, and nail carving. The lightly nail brush handle is more flexible and easy when applying acrylic powder. Suitable for young nails or pursue drawing a more delicate and exquisite effect.

【BEST GIFT】A perfect kolinsky acrylic nail brush for professional salons and home DIY nail art. Ideal gift for Mother's day, Valentine's Day, Birthday, Christmas, and Wedding Anniversary.It is the best choice for all professional manicurists and the best gifts for your friends.

videos.title: ANGNYA Acrylic Pure Kolinsky Nail Brush
